entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump Why would you even mention slowing down Coronavirus testing during your failed rally? Now the WH is saying that it was a "tongue in cheek" comment. I say it was your head up your ass comment. Not funny.
